default_commands.name: addquote
default_commands.description: Adds a quote to the database (mods only)

default_commands.name: quote
default_commands.description: Returns either quote number [num] (argument 1) or a random quote

default_commands.name: hello
default_commands.description: Says hello back to the user

default_commands.name: shoutout
default_commands.description: Shouts out the specified user (mods only)

default_commands.name: title
default_commands.description: Changes the title of the stream (mods only)

default_commands.name: game
default_commands.description: Changes the game category to the specified game (mods only)

default_commands.name: add_command
default_commands.description: Adds [command] (argument 1) that will put [text] (argument 2) in chat when called (mods only). Syntax: !add_command twitter Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/dunno4321

default_commands.name: remove_command
default_commands.description: Removes [command] (argument 1) from the custom commands list (mods only)

default_commands.name: watchtime
default_commands.description: Returns with the amount of time the user has spend watching the channel since this bot was implemented

default_commands.name: love
default_commands.description: Returns the calculated love between the chatter and the specified item

default_commands.name: syntax
default_commands.description: Gives syntax on how to add an advanced custom command
